text_sections.section_2: During the development phase of the UTN the Founding Steering Board acts as a central decision-making and supervisory body and is responsible for a wide array of matters such as research and innovation, support of early career researchers and academic affairs.
text_sections.section_3: For further questions please contact Team Boards, Networks and Controlling (mailto:steering-board@utn.de) .
